abstract: Escalating Greek debt crisis has increased likelihood that country will abandon euro and replace it with national currency, change that would be globally unprecedented in modern times; potential aftereffects of such move, which is not currently supported by Greek leaders or citizens, highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Economists cannot think of a time when a developed country with an open economy dropped out of a shared currency and set up a new one, and many worry that path would be dangerous one.

headline.main: If Greece Is Shut Out of the Eurozone, It Will Sail Into Uncharted Waters
headline.print_headline: If Greece Is Shut Out of the Eurozone, It Will Sail Into Uncharted Waters

snippet: Economists cannot think of a time when a developed country with an open economy dropped out of a shared currency and set up a new one, and many worry that path would be dangerous one.
